head: Hot Scoops
Title: Samsung Galaxy F22 launched in India: Price, features, other details
detail: Samsung Galaxy F22 has been launched in India. The new smartphone has been priced in the mid-range segment. The new smartphone is powered by a MediaTek chipset and features a high refresh rate AMOLED display.
